title: Binance Claims Ignorance of $10 Billion Fine Imposed by Nigerian Government
description: Binance, a leading cryptocurrency exchange, has denied allegations made by a Nigerian government official that it is facing a $10 billion fine. While Binance maintains its commitment to fostering a positive relationship with the Nigerian government, it firmly states that it will not succumb to pressure to pay for the release of its detained executives. […]

title: Why is Bitcoin rising?
description:
The recent introduction of Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs) has injected a new dynamic into the cryptocurrency market, particularly evident in the remarkable surge in trading volumes witnessed this week. Retail traders, in particular, are using these ETFs to tap into Bitcoin’s ongoing rally, which saw...
